tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneticVariationData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    chromosome VARCHAR,
    position INT,
    gene_name VARCHAR,
    variant_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE population_genetics_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  population_name VARCHAR(50),
  study_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_variations (
  variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  variation_type VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome_number INT,
  position INT,
  allele1 VARCHAR(1),
  allele2 VARCHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE gene_features (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  gene_length INT,
  gene_description TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE population_genetics_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, population_name VARCHAR(255), genotype VARCHAR(255), variant_type VARCHAR(50), allele_frequency FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE sample_metadata (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_name VARCHAR(255), population_name VARCHAR(255), collection_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE gene_annotation (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(255), chromosome VARCHAR(10), start_position INT, end_position INT);
CREATE TABLE analysis_results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, analysis_date DATE, significant BOOLEAN, p_value FLOAT, study_name VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE Variants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variant_name TEXT,
  chromosome TEXT,
  position INT,
  allele1 TEXT,
  allele2 TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name TEXT,
  population TEXT,
  date_collected DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Genes (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name TEXT,
  chromosome TEXT,
  start_position INT,
  end_position INT
)

CREATE TABLE Populations (
  population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  population_name TEXT,
  region TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name TEXT,
  researcher_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)
